title: Winding Down
author: verias
text:
My visitor from England will be heading home early Tuesday morning, so I'll be off my own kinda...minivacation that's been occupying my last two weeks.

It looks like Theresa has pawned William off on a rather excited Chrys with plans of her own.

Who is ready to see what comes next?

replies.author: Bob!*Guest*
replies.text: Hopefully that gem will allow him to walk around at more then Cons and Renfests
